for-agents.automate_ticket_text: On this page, you will find all the necessary information, tools, and resources for successful operation. We invite agencies involved in selling tickets for international passenger transport, as well as companies working in the employment sector in Europe, to collaborate.

why_join_us_text.personal_account_text: Each partner can create their own agent network and increase their income.
why_join_us_text.direct_collaboration_text: Earn from ticket sales directly from carriers.
why_join_us_text.no_limits_or_quotas_text: Earn from 10% on each ticket sold and enjoy a stable income.

for-agents.features_text: GreenBus offers extensive opportunities for partners: an efficient ticket sales system, access to a network of carriers, and a stable income. We support our partners at every stage, providing all the necessary tools for business success.
